foil.title: What does the Raspberry Pi 3 Have?

listitem.para: Reasonably powerful (4 core x 1 GHz) ARM processor
1 GB RAM
SD card support
USB 2.0 ports
HDMI out
Audio / Composite video out
Wifi
Camera (with extra Pi module or USB)
LCD (with extra Pi module or USB or GPIO or I2C or SPI controlled)
Do on/off (digital) electronics including interfacing to other boards, or turning LEDs on/off etc
Interface with I2C or SPI bus electronics
Communicate with serial port devices (RX/TX/GND)

foil.title: What can you do with it?

listitem.para: Robotics (using the above)

IoT

Home Automation
Use it a desktop computer
Use it as a low power server
Much more...
